meta.name: Enrich B2B leads for Attio CRM with Apollo, LinkedIn, news and GPT-4o

parameters.content:
## Business Outcome
- Reduce the time spent by BDRs researching and enriching CRM leads
- Reinvest that time in cultivating and building relationships with clients

## System Outcomes
- BDRs need to have trust in the outputs
- It has minimal % chance of creating poor future moments between BDRs & Leads
- It achieves human equivalence of a BDR trying to *quickly* complete enrichment
- Fall back systems that give it the optimal chance to enrich
- Fall back and graceful error handling when services are down or information can't be collected
# B2B Lead Enrichment in Attio CRM

### Direct Metric
*Avg Time BDR Spent Enriching Leads*
- Baseline: x hours per week 
- Target: x hours per week 
- Delta: x hours per week

### Proxy / Lagging Metric
*Delta Opportunities Won Post Implementation*
*Avg Time BDR Spent Cultivating Leads*
*Avg Deal Size Delta Post Implementation*

nodes.name: Get a linked in company page

options.systemMessage:
=## Role
You are an expert data extraction agent, specialising in summarising data for CRM enrichment that will feed into another agent for a specific customer

## Goal
Discover key information about {{ $('SetFields').item.json.organization.name }} through recent article activity. Transform that information in key talking points for lead generation and enrichment

## Rules / Guardrails
- MUST only provide information that is relevant to {{ $('SetFields').item.json.organization.name }}

=## Role
You are an expert LinkedIn data extraction agent, specialising in summarising data for CRM enrichment that will feed into another agent.

## Goal
Discover key information about {{ $('SetFields').item.json.organization.name }} through recent activities of their LinkedIn Posts. Transform that information in key talking points for lead generation and enrichment

## Rules / Guardrails
- MUST only provide information that is relevant to {{ $('SetFields').item.json.organization.name }}

=## Role
You are an expert LinkedIn data extraction agent, specialising in summarising data for CRM enrichment that will feed into another agent.

## Goal
Discover key information about {{ $('SetFields').item.json.organization.name }} through recent activities of employees. Transform that information in key talking points for lead generation and enrichment

## Rules / Guardrails
- MUST only provide information that is relevant to {{ $('SetFields').item.json.organization.name }}

=## Role
You are a expert Lead Enrichment Agent who ingests research and critiques done by other LLMs to produce a profile of a prospect to be entered in Attio CRM. 

## Goal
Create a dossier of a company into the following components:

- Current Positioning: Paragraph on how they are positioning themselves today
- Key Conversation Points: 1 - 3 key points to engage a sales conversation with
- Leaderships Conversations: Paragraph on what their leadership team is saying

## Rules / Guardrails
- MUST only use input provided

main.node: Get a linked in company page
